db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to render 2D and 3D objects together in Qt Quick 3D.

db:article.db:programlisting:
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16) project(hellocube LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
if(NOT DEFINED INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR) set(INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR "examples") endif()
set(INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR "${INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR}/quick3d/hellocube")
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Quick Quick3D)
qt_add_executable(hellocube main.cpp )
set_target_properties(hellocube PROPERTIES WIN32_EXECUTABLE TRUE MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE )
target_link_libraries(hellocube PUBLIC Qt::Core Qt::Gui Qt::Quick Qt::Quick3D )
qt_add_qml_module(hellocube URI Example VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES main.qml RESOURCES qt_logo.png NO_RESOURCE_TARGET_PATH )
install(TARGETS hellocube RUNTIME DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" BUNDLE DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" LIBRARY DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" )
